    Descriptions for metadata columns

    Dataset metadata

    Generation of specificity matrices/dataframes

    • The majority of specificity matrices have been downloaded from external sources (primarily Skene 2018; with specificity matrices made available in the associated GitHub repo).
    • A few specificity matrices have been specifically generated within the MarkerGene package, including:
      • Zeisel et al. 2018 (see: Zeisel2018_CNSClusters_FormattingDataForEWCE.R)
      • Allen Brain Atlas 2018 (only MTG).
        • Downloaded from AIBS.
        • Used gene-level (exonic) read count values.
        • For code on how this was generated, please refer to: AIBS2018_GeneratingSImatrix.R.
      • Agarwal 2020.
        • Data downloaded from GEO.
        • For code on how this was generated, please refer to: Agarwal2020_GeneratingSImatrix.R
    • Finally, a specificity dataframe was generated within the MarkerGene package for GTEx v8.
      • This was generated by modifying code from the article, Bryois 2020, which was made available here: https://github.com/jbryois/scRNA_disease/blob/master/Code_Paper/Code_GTEx/get_GTEx_input.md.
      • The primary modification was to include all genes, including non-protein-coding genes, which were previously excluded.
      • For all details on the generation of this specificity dataframe, please refer to: GTEx_v8_specificity.html.
